com.fsck.k9.mail: handles exceptions related to email messaging in a Java program.
provides methods to check if debugging is enabled and if sensitive debugging information is enabled in K9MailLib.
provides methods for managing the debug status and sensitivity of the K9MailLib mail library.
provides methods to access and manipulate various properties and contents of an email message part.
defines the methods required to establish a connection to a mail server and send email messages.
defines a set of methods that allow interactions with a mail store, including retrieving and manipulating email messages, sending email, and checking mail settings.
provides methods to handle parsing, encoding, and manipulation of email addresses and personal names.
provides methods to compute and handle authentication for email accounts.
provides methods to handle different transfer encodings for the body of an email message.
represents an exception that occurs during certificate validation in email communication.
generates a unique boundary string for use in email messages.
represents a part of an email message and provides methods for setting and retrieving its encoding, parent, and serverExtra fields.
provides methods for decoding and creating transport-specific URIs and ServerSettings objects in Java.
creates a mail body object from an input stream and content transfer encoding and content type parameters.
provides callbacks for events related to the retrieval of email messages.
provides a method to create a mail body with specified characteristics.
provides methods for managing and controlling push notification services for email communication.
provides methods for setting and checking the debug status of the K9MailLib Java class.
provides settings for storing and transporting emails and includes methods for creating new instances with updated certificate alias or password and comparing equality between instances.
provides methods to control and modify the debug status of the K9MailLib library.
provides a way to get a mail transport object based on the provided store configuration using SMTP and WebDav protocols.
provides methods for handling push notifications in an email messaging system.
provides a mapping between Android ConnectivityManager network types and K-9 Mail network types.
provides methods for handling multipart MIME messages in Java.
provides methods to manipulate and retrieve various properties of an email message.
represents an exception that occurs when there is an issue with a certificate chain in email messages sent and received by the K-9 Mail app.
provides a set of methods for manipulating and retrieving emails within a mail folder.
com.fsck.k9.mail.filter: encodes byte data into Base64 format and writes it to an output stream.
provides a method for writing bytes to an output stream with SMTP data stuffing to prevent message delimiter collision.
provides a mechanism for transitioning between different states based on an input parameter in the context of signing and encryption for email filters.
encodes an array of bytes into a string of lower-case hexadecimal characters.
counts the number of bytes written to an output stream.
provides methods for encoding and decoding data using the Base64 algorithm, as well as for checking whether a given byte array or byte is part of the Base64 alphabet.
provides the ability to peek at and potentially reuse upcoming bytes in an input stream while maintaining state information.
converts and flushes line endings in an output stream.
provides methods for reading a fixed length of bytes from an input stream, skipping specified number of bytes, and discarding any remaining bytes.
provides methods to encode and write bytes to an output stream while ensuring its safe closure.
com.fsck.k9.mail.helper: provides methods for encoding and decoding UTF-8 strings for use in URLs.
com.fsck.k9.mail.internet: extracts list post addresses from an email message.
provides methods for handling binary temporary files associated with the content of an email message.
supports character encoding operations for email parts and addresses.
provides a method to encode a given text into an encoded word or a sequence of encoded words separated by space.
provides methods for handling JIS variants and checking character encoding in emails.
manages and manipulates MimeHeaders in email messages.
converts ISO-2022-JP encoded characters to Shift-JIS encoding.
provides an input stream for a binary temporary file and allows the file to be closed and deleted or closed without deletion.
provides functionality to access the Part associated with a textual message in an email.
builds and constructs a MIME message with various methods for setting the header, body, preamble, epilogue, and body parts of the message.
generates unique message IDs for email messages.
provides methods for extracting text content, viewable parts, attachments, and text parts from email messages.
manages and manipulates the content and headers of a MIME body part in an email message.
can decode a string containing encoded words as defined by RFC 2047.
provides a set of utilities for working with MIME messages, including decoding and encoding, retrieving MIME types based on file extensions, and parsing header fields.
represents a MIME header field and provides methods to get and set its value and name.
represents a MIME email message and provides methods to manipulate its headers, content, recipients, and other properties.
provides methods to retrieve viewable content and HTML content from an email message.
provides methods to manipulate and set properties of MIME message parts.
provides the functionality to check the value of the `delSp` boolean variable.
manages the encoding of binary message bodies.
provides a method to retrieve the encoding type of a raw data body in Java.
handles MIME multipart messages, including setting and retrieving the preamble, epilogue, boundary, and body parts.
provides a method to retrieve the size of an object in bytes.
provides methods for getting, setting, and manipulating the encoding, size, and content of text bodies in emails.
provides methods to access the message and container part of an email header.
com.fsck.k9.mail.message: parses the header of a MIME message in K-9 mail and provides methods for handling different parts of the header.
parses the headers of a mail message's part.
com.fsck.k9.mail.oauth: parses challenge requests for OAuth2 authentication and determines if a response should be retried based on the parsed status.
provides methods for requesting API authorization, fetching and invalidating OAuth2 tokens for specific usernames, and getting a list of accounts suitable for OAuth 2.0 token provision.
defines callback methods for handling the success or failure of OAuth2 authentication.
com.fsck.k9.mail.power: provides a tracing power manager for managing power-related functionalities in email applications.
com.fsck.k9.mail.ssl: creates SSL/TLS sockets with trusted SSL certificates and provides methods to set client certificate properties and set the hostname for the SSL socket.
implements a custom X509TrustManager for SSL/TLS connections in the K9 mail client that checks client and server certificates for validity and manages trusted issuers.
provides methods to manage and validate X509 certificates for a given host and port in a local key store.
manages SSL/TLS key chains for server and client authentication.
creates SSL/TLS sockets with client certificate alias for a given host and port.
provides a way to obtain an instance of X509TrustManager for a specified host and port.
com.fsck.k9.mail.store.imap: provides methods to parse and retrieve permanent mailbox flags and whether new keyword creation is allowed for an IMAP mailbox.
provides methods for managing and manipulating email messages in an IMAP email store.
provides settings for connecting to an IMAP email store and allows for the creation of new instances with updated authentication details.
provides methods for parsing and retrieving a list of message numbers from IMAP SEARCH responses.
handles callbacks for when a literal string is found in an IMAP response during parsing.
parses IMAP responses from a server and returns them as an ImapResponse object.
represents the state of an IMAP mailbox for push notifications and provides methods for parsing and converting the state to a string representation.
creates an ImapStore URI using server settings.
provides methods for retrieving the prefix and hierarchy delimiter of a mailbox namespace, as well as parsing a list of IMAP responses for the first namespace response.
extracts response codes from IMAP server responses.
provides methods for establishing and managing connections to an IMAP server.
provides functionality to parse and determine the open mode of an IMAP mailbox.
provides utility methods to work with IMAP servers in email communication.
provides methods to get and set various IMAP email account settings, such as username, password, connection security, port number, authentication type, and mailbox folder paths.
handles and represents responses received from an IMAP server, including tagged and untagged responses, continuation requests, and associated callbacks.
provides a method for parsing IMAP responses and creating MimeBodyPart objects.
stores the settings and credentials for accessing an IMAP email server.
pushes new messages from an IMAP folder to a device in real-time.
decodes an ImapStore URI into an object of type `com.fsck.k9.mail.store.imap.ImapStoreSettings`.
parses literal message bodies from an IMAP server response and returns placeholder objects.
implements functionality for pushing new email messages to a client's mailbox through synchronization and refresh intervals.
manages the idle mode and acceptance of "done continuation" commands for an IMAP folder pusher.
throws an exception when an unexpected or negative response is received during an IMAP transaction and provides methods to retrieve information about the response.
encodes and decodes folder names using a modified UTF-7 charset.
parses and retrieves the capabilities of an IMAP mail store.
provides a method to search for emails in an IMAP mailbox and return a list of IMAP responses.
provides a method to extract alert text from an IMAP response.
provides methods to manipulate and retrieve values from an IMAP list.
provides a method for handling asynchronous untagged responses received from an IMAP server.
provides methods for managing and manipulating email folders stored on an IMAP server.
provides methods to interact with an IMAP email server, such as creating URIs, getting folders, checking settings, and supporting push notifications.
handles pushing new email messages to an IMAP folder in an email client's folder pusher and handles exceptions that may occur during that process.
parses IMAP responses and provides UID mappings for copied messages.
provides methods for parsing and accessing information about IMAP mailbox listings.
com.fsck.k9.mail.store.pop3: provides information on the capabilities and features supported by a POP3 email server.
reads bytes from an input stream for a POP3 response.
provides methods to interact with a POP3 email server and manage email folders and settings.
handles operations on POP3 email messages including setting and updating flags, marking as deleted, and setting message size.
represents a POP3 email folder in a Java email client and provides methods to interact with the server, fetch and delete messages, and manage flags.
com.fsck.k9.mail.store.webdav: provides various methods to manipulate and retrieve data related to mailbox messages, URLs and their attributes in a WebDAV store.
provides functionality for executing HTTP requests and handling gzipped responses in a WebDAV mail store.
creates a new instance of the WebDavHttpClient class.
provides settings for a WebDav email store, such as retrieving extra settings and creating a new instance with a new password.
is a WebDav handler for a Java mail store that parses XML data and populates a Java object with the data.
creates a WebDAV store URI for a given server setting.
decodes a WebDavStore URI into its parts and creates a new instance of `WebDavStoreSettings`.
handles HTTP requests for webdav communication.
provides methods for handling email messages stored in a WebDav server.
provides methods to manipulate and retrieve information about a parsed email message in a WebDAV email store.
provides methods to interact with an email folder in a WebDAV email account.
provides methods for creating and managing SSL sockets for WebDAV connections.
provides functionality for accessing and managing email messages in a WebDAV email store.
com.fsck.k9.mail.store: provides methods for managing and creating instances of remote mail stores and decoding and creating store-specific URIs.
defines methods for configuring various email folders and settings for a mail store.
